item.title: New community for LM-Commons on Slack
item.description: We have created a LM-Commons community on Slack.
item.content:encoded:
We have created a LM-Commons community on Slack.

This will be the preferred community to ask questions and get support.

Please join the community using this invitation link.

item.title: LmcBootstrapMenu v1.0.0. is available
item.description: LmcBootstrapMenu is a new LM-Commons package that provides a Bootstrap menu helper.
item.content:encoded:
LmcBootstrapMenu is a new LM-Commons package that provides a Bootstrap menu helper.

The repository is available on GitHub LM-Commons/LmcBootstrapMenu.

It is also available on Packagist via Composer. Please see installation instructions in the README.md file in the GitHub repository.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to the new documentation website for the LM-Commons organization.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the new documentation website for the LM-Commons organization.

This site is work in progress and the intent is obviously to keep it current with updates to the LM-Commons packages.
